column4: Bally's Corporation operates as a casino-entertainment company. The company operates through Casinos & Resorts, International Interactive and North America Interactive segments. It owns and manages casinos in the United States, a golf course in New York, a horse racetrack in Colorado, and holds OSB licenses in 13 jurisdictions in North America. The company also owns casino in Newcastle, the United Kingdom; Bally Bet, a sports betting platform; and Bally Casino, as well as is involved in the interactive gaming operations, and lottery management and services businesses. Its casino operations include slot machines, table games, and hotel rooms. It also has rights to developable land in Las Vegas. Bally's Corporation was formerly known as Twin River Worldwide Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Bally's Corporation in November 2020. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island.
